author: Staff Reporter
text:
Villagers staged a road roko in the Tiruvannamalai-Manalurpettai road on Saturday.

They demanded house site patta and condemned the revenue officials for their alleged attempt to give away land in which they demand patta to ruling party men.

On government land

People belonging to Mazhuvangarai village in Manalurpet Road were demanding house site patta in a 3 acre government land available in their village.

Meanwhile the villagers allege that though their repeated plea for patta was turned down officials were attempting to give away the land to ruling party men.

Condemning this, the villagers staged road roko on Saturday and 26 of them were arrested.
title: Villagers stage road roko demanding house site patta
